channel.title: Need Coder or someone to explain plz
channel.description: Hello i would like to add elemental bars to on my server so you can smith dragon and crystal shields and would like golden bars to smith gilded and trimmed things plz help

item.title: Need Coder or someone to explain plz
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Try debugging and learning yourself, C&P everything will teach you nothing. Getting other people to do things for you is 10x worse.
